scripts.prestart: rm -rf dist & cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && mv ./frontend/dist ./dist
scripts.start: cd backend && rm -f gameMaster.json && cp gameMaster_real.json gameMaster.json && cd .. && nodemon index.js
scripts.preinstall: cd frontend && npm install && pip3 install locust
scripts.pretest: cd backend && rm -f gameMaster.json && cp gameMaster_test.json gameMaster.json && cd .. && start nodemon index.js
